title: feat: add Alibaba DashScope fallback for Wan video model
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: The show must go on
gist.blurb: We've added a robust backup system for Wan video generation. If the primary path is busy, our bees automatically switch to Alibaba DashScope to keep your videos rolling.
gist.summary: Implemented Alibaba DashScope as an automatic fallback provider for the Wan video model (T2V and I2V) to ensure successful generation even if the primary API fails.
gist.impact: Video generation is now significantly more reliable, with automatic failover preventing errors during high traffic.
gist.visual_concept: A movie set theme representing video generation. The concept of 'fallback' or 'reliability' is depicted by a backup power source or a second bee helping out. The bee mascot is the director.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute bee director standing next to a retro movie camera connected to a glowing lime green (#ecf874) backup battery. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'ACTION'. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute bee director standing next to a retro movie camera connected to a glowing lime green (#ecf874) backup battery. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'ACTION'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
